I support other Etsy artists by purchasing their beads and supplies to use in my jewelry designs. I used beautiful ceramic Goddess charm made by Beadfreaky in this necklace.

name: Hand Carved Bone Leaf Goddess Necklace. African Bead Tribal Necklace. Ethnic Goddess Necklace.
description:
~ Spiritual Necklace ~ Goddess Necklace ~ Nature Spirits Necklace ~

~ Hand carved bone leaf and goddess focal pendant ~ Creamy beads in shades of orange and yellow with earthy African clay beads and picture jasper. A wonderful piece for a healer or to gift someone special in your life. Made with love, respect and honor for all of the elements used in the necklace. 

Beads: Creamy burnt orange African Amber, Yellow Jade, Czech Glass Turquoise Discs, Picture Jasper and African Clay beads 
Length: 32" + 3" chain extension + 3" Leaf Goddess Pendant ~
Detail: Sterling Silver Bail

About the Spirit Pendants:

The pendants are carved from the bone of Indonesian Water Buffalo which also have good-sized horns that are carved as well. These animals are used in the rice fields, and are not killed for their bone or horn, they are far more useful in the rice fields. When they die, nothing is wasted. The bone is sterilized and bleached. The gem quality bone has a close grain, and carves smoothly taking a bright polish. The carvings are made by master artisans. 

“Spirit Art inspires and moves the wordless places within, that connect with the soul. Each carving (Human form, Goddess, or Spirit Animal), has endured a great journey, both of time and distance. Each one creates it’s own Story.” author unknown

reference materials - "Medicine Cards" by Jamie Sams and "Animal Speak" by Ted Andrews

Thanks for visiting Cyndy Kempken Jewelry, Silk & Scarves.

name: Hand Made Ceramic Eagle and Goddess Necklace. African Amber Tribal Necklace.
description:
I found the Hand Made Ceramic Eagle and Goddess tribal pendant and oval beads at the Tucson Gem and Mineral show earlier this year and fell in love with the design, color and detail. When I sat down to design the necklace this weekend, the perfect beads I'd purchased and collected over the past several years found their way onto the table. The ideal combination of earthy and vibrant color bring out the incredible detail in the eagle and goddess pendant. 

~ Creamy burnt orange African Amber, Yellow Jade, Czech Glass Turquoise Discs and African Clay beads ~ 
~ Spiritual Necklace ~ Goddess Necklace ~ Eagle Totem Necklace

~ Length: 24" + 3" chain extension + 5" Pendant with dangles ~

name: Hand Painted Lime Green Silk Shawl with Fringe, Chartreuse Silk Scarf, Made in Arizona
description:
There are no words to describe how incredibly luxurious this hand painted silk scarf feels and flows when you put it on. I used chartreuse for the main color and then added circles colored with salmon, light blue, golden yellow, lime, and brick. It is the perfect weight to use as a shawl or to tie as a scarf. This is a great accessory to add to your wardrobe that will bring you immense enjoyment for years to come.

There are no limits on how to wear a scarf. Stand in front of a mirror and let your imagination run wild as you try different ways to wrap and tie the scarf. You will be amazed at how easy and fun it is to come up with your unique style in just minutes.

The scarf and trim are made of 100% silk. The hems are hand sew. I hand painted this scarf in my studio using paint brushes and non-toxic silk paints.

Each hand painted silk scarf is a unique piece of wearable art that never goes out of style. They are perfect for all occasions and as gifts for women of all ages.

Care instructions: Hand wash ONLY. Use cool water/gentle soap if needed. Add a tsp of fabric softener for extra silky feel. Use appropriate heat setting on iron.

Flat crepe silk fringe shawl. Size 14" x 72" + 4 1/2" fringe.

S269

name: Nuno Felted Scarf, Turquoise and Coral, Gifts for Her, Modern Chic, Womens Fashion Silk
description:
I handmade this turquoise and coral nuno felted scarf using silk gauze and high quality Merino Wool. The coral geometric patterns add a splash of color and it is the perfect size to wear as a scarf or wrapped and pinned around the neck for a statement piece. It is a nice long length so it can be wrapped once or twice around you neck for a comfortable fit.

I used quality Merino wool and 100% silk gauze to create this light as air nuno felted scarf. It has an amazing soft luxurious feel against the skin. The back side is all felted in black. This listing is for scarf only.

Size 50" long. 4 1/2" Wide

Hand wash in cool water. Use a gentle soap if necessary. Lightly squeeze. Sandwich between a towel. Roll and squeeze out excess moisture. After this step it almost will be dry. Lay flat. Reshape if necessary. It can be touched up with a steam iron on wool setting.

FS126

name: Turquoise and Berry Nuno Felted Scarf, Gifts for Her, Boho Chic, Womens Fashion, Sash, Corsette
description:
I handmade this cheery floral patch nuno felted scarf using warm shades of green turquoise, berry, ecru, and dijon mustard. Its crisp look and soft texture will make this a scarf you won't want to leave home without. It can be wrapped snug around your neck and secured with a pin, used as a scarf, scarflette, sash or even as a corset belt.

I used quality Merino wool and 100% silk gauze to create this light as air nuno felted scarf. It has an amazing soft luxurious feel against the skin. The back side is all felted in black.

Size 44" long. 4" Wide

Hand wash in cool water. Use a gentle soap if necessary. Lightly squeeze. Sandwich between a towel. Roll and squeeze out excess moisture. After this step it almost will be dry. Lay flat. Reshape if necessary. It can be touch up with steam iron on wool setting.
